greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of an n-set into blocks of size > 4.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..589 (terms 0..300 from Alois P. Heinz)
E. A. Enneking and J. C. Ahuja, Generalized Bell numbers, Fib. Quart., 14 (1976), 67-73.
formula: a(0) = 1; a(n) = Sum_{k=5..n} binomial(n-1,k-1) * a(n-k). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Feb 09 2020
mathematica: max = 27; CoefficientList[ Series[ Exp[ Exp[x] - Normal[ Series[ Exp[x], {x, 0, 4}]]], {x, 0, max}], x]*Range[0, max]!(* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 25 2012, from e.g.f. *)
results.author: Steven C. Fairgrieve (fsteven(AT)math.wvu.edu), Nov 06 2000
